title: Computer-Based Tutoring Education to Strengthen Trauma Nursing Competency at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Trauma nursing education conducted in a restricted technological environment centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can identify core assessment items with over 70% accuracy when nursing trauma patients.
Learners perform trauma nursing procedures (hemorrhage control, airway management, etc.) with over 80% completeness in a simulation environment.
Learners achieve a score improvement of over 25% compared to pre-test in trauma nursing knowledge assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
